br.com.limaogames.librpg.framework.abstracts

Class Skill

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.limaogames.librpg.framework.abstracts.Skill
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SkillListener, java.io.Serializable

    public abstract class Skill
extends java.lang.Object
implements SkillListener, java.io.Serializable
    Model class to be inherited by skill classes. This class contains methods and variables that can be easily set by any skill class. Ex: a class called Fireball can inherit Skill class and implements all its methods and set variables.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Limao Games
    Email: andreikeda@limaogames.com.br
    created on: 07/02/2014
    See Also:
    Adventurer.Status, Damage, Serializable, SkillListener, Serialized Form

          Damage damage,
          Adventurer.Status illness)
        Description copied from interface: SkillListener
        Creates instance of Skill.
        Specified by:
        create in interface SkillListener
        Parameters:
        id - - object's identifier.
        name - - object's name. It can be null, but it's not recommended.
        description - - object's description. It can be null.
        manaCost - - object's mana cost.
        type - - Skill.Type.
        damage - - amount of damage caused by this object.
        illness - - Adventurer.Status.
